## Summary

Brief description of changes.

## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change fixing an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change adding functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature causing existing functionality to change)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Refactoring (no functional changes)
- [ ] CI/CD changes

## Checklist

- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have run `uv run ruff check .` and `uv run ruff format .`
- [ ] I have run `uv run mypy src/statatest --strict`
- [ ] I have added tests covering my changes
- [ ] All new and existing tests pass (`uv run pytest`)
- [ ] I have updated documentation as needed
- [ ] My commits follow [Conventional Commits](https://conventionalcommits.org)
      format
